function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of access to outdoor spaces in buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of severe depression syndromes and limited socialization opportunities","Mitigation":"Build accessible and livable outdoor spaces such as balconies and gardens","Technologies":"Glass walls, outdoor landscaping, and balcony design","People":"Building occupants","Owner":"Building developers and architects"},{"Description":"Risk of COVID-19 propagation in common building spaces","Impact":"Rapid spread of the virus through shared spaces leading to increased infections","Mitigation":"Implement safety measures such as wider corridors and glass walls to prevent crowdedness and limit virus propagation","Technologies":"Glass walls, air filtration systems, and wider corridor design","People":"Building occupants, public","Owner":"Building management and developers"},{"Description":"Inadequate air filtration systems against pathogen propagation","Impact":"Increased risk of air-borne pathogen transmission within buildings","Mitigation":"Enhance air filtration systems to improve efficiency against pathogen propagation","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, ventilation design, and air quality monitoring","People":"Building occupants, public","Owner":"Building management and developers"}]}
